location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Last Page of a Letter from David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is truncated, possibly as a result of weeding, which means that the first half of the letter is missing; the author is therefore unknown. It is requesting the service of a ship of war for an unknown purpose, and the vessel's intended destination has been lost.The letter has been marked with a large blue cross from top to bottom.
